## NetworkConfig.minInitiateIntervalMs property

The minimum amount of time that must be allowed to pass before a gossip round can be initiated by a given peer.

This is a rate-limiting mechanism to be enforced against incoming gossip and therefore must be respected when initiating too.

Default: 100

**Signature:**

```typescript
minInitiateIntervalMs?: number;
```
